stories.title: YouTuber Daniel Rakowiecki fix Red Camera that service couldn't fix

stories.text:
Hi guys!

I'm going to open a segment on our agency website to feature some founders of companies already funded. We'll send you a few questions via email in order to know more about your company.

We want to guide new entrepreneurs on how to find product-market fit and avoid marketing strategies mistakes.

Who's in?

By the way, if you are not funded yet, you can leave questions you might be looking answer from other founders.
